title: Poland
brief_description: Shows Warsaw and historic buildings. Warsaw has half of the total world population of Jews. Zinc is its prime export. In the country large estates, presided over by peasants are shown. School life includes lace making and woodcraft. In the main port of Gdynia, coal and lumber and the main exports.
